_header: To wit on what manner and how
_description: Rhyming rubric heading in New Haven, Yale University, Beinecke Library, Takamiya Deposit 15 [Sotheby’s, 10 Dec. 1969, Lot 43; acquired by Takamiya in 1976] to 1293

TokyoTak15.Transcription:
To wytt on what maner & how a man be grace þat will may now
                    make his purgatory here Her he be busked to his bereIn cace
                    þat þou can on bokeBe þis ryme þen may þou
                    loke
TokyoTak15.Note:
Main text, after six introductory couplets, begins, ‘Fader of
                    heuen all weldyng / Þat in wisdam made all
                    thyng…’.
